Learning Material for Basic Statistical Methods
===============================================

Interactive Courses
-------------------

-  `Special Topics in Astrophysics: Statistical Methods @
   Stanford <https://github.com/KIPAC/StatisticalMethods>`__

   -  `There are a lot of useful notebooks using astrophysical problems
      as
      examples <https://github.com/KIPAC/StatisticalMethods/tree/master/chunks>`__
